# Jan Medina — janbmedina.com

## About
Jan Medina is an IT Professional and Developer based in Auckland, New Zealand.
He manages enterprise device fleets, automates IT workflows, and builds iOS and web apps.

## Professional Background
- Full-time IT System Administrator
- Specializes in JAMF Pro, Microsoft Intune, Active Directory, Azure AD
- PowerShell scripting and MDM policy automation
- Enterprise device fleet management across macOS, Windows, iOS

## Development Skills
- React, TypeScript, JavaScript, Node.js
- Swift for iOS development
- Astro for static site generation
- Git, Xcode, VS Code

## Projects
1. **NeoBrutalist Personal OS** — A retro desktop OS experience built with React, featuring 20+ mini apps including a file explorer, calculator, weather app, retro TV player, and more
2. **Move45** — iOS app for building a daily 45-minute movement habit (available on App Store)
3. **IWT** — Interval walking trainer for iOS (in progress)
4. **Lifespan Tracker** — Life perspective visualizer built with React and Node.js (lifespantracker.com)
5. **CoverCraft** — Cover letter generator website

## Philosophy
Ship fast. Learn faster. Every project levels me up.
Simplicity first — elegant code over clever code.
AI is the multiplier, craft is the foundation.

## Contact
- GitHub: https://github.com/AhjinGuild12
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jjmd
- Website: https://janbmedina.com

## Site Structure
- / — Landing page with intro, skills, featured projects
- /about — Detailed bio, skills, work philosophy
- /projects — Full project showcase
- /contact — Social links and contact info
- /os — Interactive retro desktop OS experience (React app)
